name: Fey Lady, Mother Moth
damage_resistances: acid; B/P/S from attacks not made w/cold iron or cedarwood weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Hornworm Scepters or two Moon Bolts. If she hits one creature with two Hornworm Scepters target lose its lowest-level available spell slot (DC 17 Wis negates). She then regains hp equal to four times level of the lost spell slot.

actions.name: Hornworm Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) radiant.

actions.name: Moon Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, 150 ft., one target, 16 (3d10) radiant. If target is a creature in a form other than its natural form it takes an additional 5 (1d10) radiant and must make DC 17 Cha save or revert to its natural form. When moon bolt hits a target moonlight glows in that space shedding dim light until start of Mother Moth’s next turn.

actions.name: Hundreds Dusting (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Flaps her wings creating a cloud of blinding powder around her. Each creature within 20' of her: 35 (10d6) poison and is blinded for 1 min (DC 17 Con half damage and isn’t blinded). A blinded creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 17) no material components: At will: animal messenger (moth only) detect magic druidcraft faerie fire mending3/day ea: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell) dispel magic lesser restoration insect plague1/day ea: hallucinatory terrain (as an action) wall of thorns

legendary_actions.name: Moonlit Walk
legendary_actions.desc: While in dim light teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 100' of her. The space she chooses must be in dim light.

special_abilities.name: Cedar Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Vulnerable to weapons made from the wood of the cedar tree. When hit by a weapon made of cedarwood she takes damage as if the weapon was magical.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenating Chrysalis
special_abilities.desc: If killed while within a forest on the Plane of Shadow a chrysalis appears within the confines of the forest and Mother Moth emerges from it after 48 hrs regaining all her hp and becoming active again. Only the complete destruction of her chrysalis (AC 10 hp 30) prevents this trait from functioning.

special_abilities.name: Shimmering Defense
special_abilities.desc: Her wings emit sparkling dust giving a slightly blurred appearance. AC includes her Wis modifier.

special_abilities.name: Silk Sovereignty
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with all silk-producing beasts as if they shared a language. Silk-producing beasts cannot willingly attack her though they can be forced to do so through magical means. She ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing and can’t be restrained by webs or other silk-based material such as a silk net.
